name: Earth Platform
desc: A lifted platform, easy to climb but large enough to provide cover.

name: Earth Pillar
interact:
Choose one:
* 2 _Grit_: Create a Line 2 Hazard on the opposite side of this Obstacle. At the end of the Round, remove this Obstacle, resolve the below attack in those spaces, then create an _Earth Platform_ in each space. Any creature in the Obstacle's space when it is removed immediately falls.
* 4 _Grit_: As above, but resolve the Attack immediately.
 Regardless, on any Attack that does not inflict _Prone_, _Push_ the creature to the nearest unoccupied space. If this _Interact_ knocks a Medium or smaller creature _Prone_, they are also _Pinned_ until they spend 2 _Grit_.

name: Earth Column
resistances: This Obstacle has Resistance to all Damage except Crush.
interact:
Choose one:
* 4 _Grit_: Create two adjacent parallel Line 3 Hazards on the opposite side of this Obstacle. At the end of the Round, remove this Obstacle, resolve the below attack in those spaces, then create an _Earth Pillar_ in each space. Any creature in the Obstacle's space when it is removed immediately falls.
* 6 _Grit_: As above, but resolve the Attack immediately.
 Regardless, on any Attack that does not inflict _Prone_, _Push_ the creature to the nearest unoccupied space. If this _Interact_ knocks a Medium or smaller creature _Prone_, they are also _Pinned_ until they spend 3 _Grit_.
special: Only Destroy one space of this Obstacle on a successful attack. The attacker may Destroy an additional space for every 3 Damage more than the _Durability_ they inflict.

name: Boulder
interact:
Choose one:
* 2 _Grit_: _Push_ 1 this Boulder. If it is moved into a creature's space, inflict _Push_ 1, _Dazed_ 1, and 4 Damage (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If the creature negates with _Grit_, do not _Push_ the Boulder and inflict half Damge. If they _Negate_ with _Reflex_ they take no Damage, but are still _Pushed_.
* 4 _Grit_: _Push_ 3 this Boulder.  If it is moved into a creature's space, inflict _Push_ 3, _Dazed_ 2 and 6 Damage (3 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If the creature negates with _Grit_, do not _Push_ the Boulder any further and inflict half Damge. If they _Negate_ with _Reflex_ they take no Damage, but are still _Pushed_.

name: Large Boulder
interact:
Choose one:
* 4 _Grit_: _Push_ 1 this Boulder. If it is moved into a creature's space, inflict _Push_ 3, _Dazed_ 2 and 6 Damage (3 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If the creature negates with _Grit_, do not _Push_ the Boulder any further and inflict half Damge. If they _Negate_ with _Reflex_ they take no Damage, but are still _Pushed_.
* 6 _Grit_: _Push_ 2 this Boulder.  If it is moved into a creature's space, inflict _Push_ 3, _Dazed_ 3 and 8 Damage (4 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If the creature negates with _Grit_, do not _Push_ the Boulder any further and inflict half Damge. If they _Negate_ with _Reflex_ they take no Damage, but are still _Pushed_.
